  • Edit on Bitbucket

gap_fill

gap_fill(ds, var, out_var=None, max_search_dist=8)

Apply gdal.FillNoData to every time slice of var in ds.

Parameters

  • ds (xr.Dataset) – Dataset containing var.

  • var (str) – Variable name.

  • out_var (str, optional) – New variable name in case var should not be overwritten, by default None.

  • max_search_dist (int, optional) – Control the maximum size of gaps to be filled, by default 8.

Returns

Gap filled dataset.

Return type

xr.Dataset
